title: Features & Security
subtitle: Powerful features combined with industry-leading security to revolutionize prescription management

features.title: Mobile Access
features.description: Access your prescriptions anytime, anywhere through our secure website application.

features.title: Real-time Updates
features.description: Receive instant notifications on prescription status changes and medication reminders.

features.title: Family Management
features.description: Manage prescriptions for family members with designated access controls.

features.title: Instant Transfers
features.description: Send prescriptions to any pharmacy in our network with just one click.

features.title: Medication Tracking
features.description: Monitor your medication history and adherence with detailed analytics.

features.title: Provider Integration
features.description: Seamlessly connect with healthcare providers and pharmacies in our secure network.

securityOverview: TrustMeds employs industry-leading security protocols to protect your sensitive medical information. Our multi-layered approach ensures that your prescription data remains private and secure.

security.title: End-to-End Encryption
security.description: All prescription data is encrypted using military-grade encryption protocols, ensuring your information is protected from end to end.

security.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
security.description: Access to your account is secured through multiple verification steps, preventing unauthorized access even if credentials are compromised.

security.title: HIPAA Compliance
security.description: Our platform is fully compliant with healthcare privacy regulations, ensuring your medical information is handled according to strict legal standards.

security.title: Blockchain Verification
security.description: Prescriptions are verified using blockchain technology, creating an immutable record that prevents unauthorized alterations.

security.title: Secure Data Storage
security.description: Your data is stored in redundant, encrypted databases with continuous monitoring to detect and prevent potential security threats.

security.title: Regular Security Audits
security.description: Our systems undergo rigorous third-party security assessments to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
